name: SchoolQuest III: Outta School Summer Bus Part I - Steak Man
name_original: SchoolQuest III: Outta School Summer Bus Part I - Steak Man
description:
This is Part 1 of the final episode of SchoolQuest.

The idea came to me, during my time at school. The day was a whirlwind, so I didn't have a good opportunity to make it, on that day. But the events I experienced that day need to be expressed. This is a gritty re-imagining of that fateful day. A SchoolQuest, not made in school.

OOPS RE-ENABLED SCROLLBARS
